location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay, to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a copy of a letter from John Kaye, Accountant General, to Francis Warden, dated 19 September 1816, discussing the problems of delivering cash to the residency at Bussora [Basra]. Warden requests that Bruce discuss the problem with the Political Agent in Turkish Arabia.
